title: My purchase of a legendary did not give me a mystery skin as promised?
body:
I purchased a legendary skin, "Dark Star Thresh" to be specific, and I did not receive a mystery skin, is there a certain amount of time I have to wait? Please help! I purchased it on the 26th, 3 days after the even supposedly started.

(I was thinking of an old snowdown event, nevermind. XD)

replies.body:
I don't remember reading anything about getting a free mystery skin with the purchase of a legendary. Would you mind posting a link of where you found this information?

I believe there was something like that for the last Snowdown Event, so maybe your info is oudated.

I'm with *Zombiemaster*, it sounds like you're referencing the **Legendary Snowball** from [**Snowdown 2015**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/look-out-its-snowdown#legendary). 

Do you have a link to what you're talking about?
Oops. I was. A friend told me about an event this Snowdown, sorry!
